title: Are allopathy drugs harmful to the body (If used often)?
description: Answer (1 of 4): No. Nobody in the history of mankind has ever had any ill effects from any allopathic medications, or surgery for that matter. Come on, what kind of loaded question is this? Of course medications have ill effects, that's the reason you can't just go buy them in the grocery store...
